hero.subtitle: A Software Developer who
hero.headline: Crafting digital solutions
hero.tagline: Because meaningful products should be scalable, secure, and delightful to use.
hero.desc1: With a foundation in .NET and over six years in IT support, I build secure and scalable digital solutions that solve real problems with precision and creativity.
hero.desc2: I gained hands-on experience as a Fullstack Developer, taking projects from backend architecture to intuitive frontends. Today, I co-found a startup AB focused on building impactful digital products.
hero.desc3: Now, I’m advancing in IT Security Development, combining engineering with a security-first mindset to deliver technology that’s not only powerful but resilient.

exp1.title: Fullstack Developer
exp1.description: Built a new business system from scratch with .NET Core Web API, TypeScript, and Tailwind.
exp1.details:
During my time at the company, I worked across the entire stack, from databases and relational handling to backend in .NET Core Web API and frontend in TypeScript.
I was responsible for database structure and necessary changes.
On the frontend side, I built a responsive interface with TypeScript and Tailwind, customizing UI components.
In the backend, I implemented business logic and efficient data handling.
The system simplified the administration of company information, employees, and customer relations, improving workflows and internal communication.

exp2.title: IT Support Technician
exp2.description: Solved network, hardware, and software issues for employees.
exp2.details:
Responsible for solving technical problems for employees by providing fast and efficient support both onsite and via remote assistance.
Diagnosed and resolved network, hardware, and software issues.
Created and updated documentation for technical systems and procedures.
This position was held alongside my studies.

exp3.title: Higher Vocational Education
exp3.description: Studies in .NET, C#, ASP.NET, React, SQL, and CMS implementation.
exp3.details:
Studies included .NET web development with HTML, CSS, JavaScript for frontend, and C# plus ASP.NET for backend.
Data storage with SQL and CMS implementation.
The education provided a broad understanding of fullstack development, modern frameworks, and architectural principles.

exp4.title: Sales Associate
exp4.description: Helped customers with technical problems and product selection.
exp4.details:
As a sales associate, I assisted customers with product selection and provided technical advice.
I used my technical knowledge to solve problems and give recommendations, requiring the ability to explain complex information in a simple way.
